parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition module can cause the vehicle to stall or die while driving, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents. In some cases, it can also cause a fire in the ignition column or elsewhere in the vehicle.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls or dies while driving
smoke comes from the steering column or dashboard

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition switch can cause the vehicle to stall or die while driving, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents. In some cases, it can also cause a fire in the ignition column or elsewhere in the vehicle.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls or dies while driving
smoke comes from the steering column or dashboard

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the alternator can cause the vehicle to stall or die while driving, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents. In some cases, it can also cause a fire in the engine compartment.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls or dies while driving
smoke comes from the engine compartment.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical Short in the Ignition System
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: An electrical short in the ignition system can cause the vehicle to stall or die while driving, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents. In some cases, it can also cause a fire in the ignition column or elsewhere in the vehicle.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls or dies while driving
smoke comes from the steering column or dashboard

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine stalling and failure can cause accidents, leave the driver stranded, and lead to engine fires, which can result in property damage and risk to human life.
Engine overheating can cause damage to the engine and other components, leading to costly repairs and potential engine failure.
symptoms: fuel gauge and temperature gauge indicators disappearing
thermostat replacement not resolving the issue.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine fires can cause property damage, risk to human life, and result in costly repairs or total loss of the vehicle.
Timing belt failure can cause engine damage, stalling, and failure, leading to costly repairs and potential accidents.
Malfunctioning seat belts can fail to restrain occupants during accidents, leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The seat belt does not adjust properly
the seat belt does not work at all
the seat belt fails to restrain the occupant during an accident.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unavailability of Seat Belt Parts for Older Model Vehicles
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of availability of seat belt parts for older model vehicles can lead to compromised safety, as owners may be unable to repair or replace faulty seat belts.
symptoms: Ford does not have the necessary parts
owners are unable to find replacement parts
owners are forced to use alternative
